description: Allows the Dragon to stop flying and transition into perching mode.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Dragonlanding Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the Dragon to stop flying and transition into perching mode. Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
